code: import React from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QuestionScreen=_ref=>{let{question,currentQuestionNumber,totalQuestions,onAnswer}=_ref;const handleAnswer=isYes=>{onAnswer({questionId:question.id,answer:isYes,totalScore:isYes?question.yesScore:question.noScore});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"question-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"progress",children:["\u8CEA\u554F ",currentQuestionNumber," / ",totalQuestions]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"question-text",children:question.questionText}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"answer-button yes-button",onClick:()=>handleAnswer(true),children:"\u306F\u3044"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"answer-button no-button",onClick:()=>handleAnswer(false),children:"\u3044\u3044\u3048"})]})]});};export default QuestionScreen;
